thread.title: Neustar to Showcase Fundamental Shifts in Mobility and IP Solutions at COMPTEL PLUS
thread.title_full: Neustar to Showcase Fundamental Shifts in Mobility and IP Solutions at COMPTEL PLUS - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Neustar to Showcase Fundamental Shifts in Mobility and IP Solutions at COMPTEL PLUS
text:
Addresses Opportunities, Challenges and Best Practices
COMPTEL PLUS Expo, SAN FRANCISCO—
(PRWEB) October 15, 2015 -- Neustar , Inc. (NYSE: NSR ), a trusted, neutral provider of real-time information services, helps enable its customers to address the fundamental shift to mobile and IP. From Caller Identification Services that verify business and consumer identity to analytics that accelerate network transformation, Neustar helps its customers optimize their business. Neustar will be hosting a lunch and speaking during the COMPTEL PLUS Fall 2015 Business Expo, Oct. 18-21, 2015 at Marriott Marquis in San Francisco.
What: Neustar presents “Mergers and Acquisitions and the Next Generation.” This talk will educate attendees on how to align resources and optimize operations— particularly at the network level—to ensure the new, combined entity has the agility and strength to compete effectively in the market.
Who: Sean Corcoran, Vice President of Corporate Development at Neustar
When: Monday, October 19, 2015 at 11:30 a.m. PT
Attendee Lunch – sponsored by Neustar
Tuesday, October 20,2015 at 10:30 a.m. PT
Speaking Session – “Mergers and Acquisitions and the Next Generation”
Where: Marriott Marquis, 780 Mission St. San Francisco, CA 94103
Yerba Buena Ballroom (Expo Hall) – Data Center and Cloud Platform Zone
Learn more about Neustar Caller Identification Services at: https://www.neustar.biz/services/caller-name-services
About Neustar
Neustar, Inc. (NYSE:NSR) is the first real-time provider of cloud-based information services, enabling marketing and IT security professionals to promote and protect their businesses. With a commitment to privacy and neutrality, Neustar operates complex data registries and uses its expertise to deliver actionable, data-driven insights that help clients make high-value business decisions in real time, one customer interaction at a time. More information is available at https://www.neustar.biz
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13017665.htm
